howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to get your vehicle from auction to your garage

step1.title: Submit Your Bid
step1.description: Enter the lot number and your maximum bid amount. We'll calculate the service fee and deposit.

step2.title: Pay Deposit
step2.description: Pay a $215 service fee plus 10% deposit. Both are fully refundable if you don't win.

step3.title: We Bid For You
step3.description: Our team attends the auction and bids on your behalf up to your maximum amount.

step4.title: Get Results
step4.description: Win or lose, we notify you immediately. If you lose, your deposit and fee are refunded.

secure.title: Secure Payments
secure.description: All payments processed through Stripe with bank-level security and encryption.

refund.title: 100% Refund Guarantee
refund.description: If you don't win, we refund your service fee and deposit in full. No questions asked.

fast.title: Fast & Professional
fast.description: Expert bidders with years of auction experience. Real-time status updates on your bids.
